title: Aggregate across time — aggregate
code: aggregate(   data,   var,   scale,   ...,   id = NULL,   index = NULL,   na.rm = TRUE,   new_name = ".agg" )

title: Aggregate across time — aggregate
text: data data frame var variable aggregate along scale time scale aggregate ... ignore id site identifier index temporal identifier na.rm logical, whether remove pending NAs aggregated new_name output name

title: Aggregate across time — aggregate
text: data frame variable specified aggregated scale

title: Aggregate across time — aggregate
code: # first 11 NA rows are removed unless specified through na.rm = FALSE tenterfield %>%   init(id = id, time = ym, indicators = prcp:tavg) %>%   aggregate(var = prcp, scale = 12) #> Removing the pending NAs due to aggregation #> Index pipeline:  #>  #> Summary:  #> temporal: `prcp` -> .agg #>  #> Data:  #> # A tibble: 358 × 8 #>    id                ym  prcp  tmax   tmin  tavg  .agg .scale #>    <chr>          <mth> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> #>  1 ASN00056032 1990 Dec   640  30.4 14.7   22.6   8382     12 #>  2 ASN00056032 1991 Jan  1108  27.5 15.9   21.7   8608     12 #>  3 ASN00056032 1991 Feb   628  28.0 15.5   21.8   7976     12 #>  4 ASN00056032 1991 Mar   204  26.2 11.8   19.0   7926     12 #>  5 ASN00056032 1991 Apr    44  24.2  6.57  15.4   6376     12 #>  6 ASN00056032 1991 May   630  21.3  7.52  14.4   5786     12 #>  7 ASN00056032 1991 Jun   242  19.6  3.65  11.6   5634     12 #>  8 ASN00056032 1991 Jul   580  15.3  0.519  7.91  5596     12 #>  9 ASN00056032 1991 Aug    14  17.8  1.67   9.76  5276     12 #> 10 ASN00056032 1991 Sep    78  21.1  3.07  12.1   5088     12 #> # … with 348 more rows  # with multiple scales tenterfield %>%   init(id = id, time = ym, indicators = prcp:tavg) %>%   aggregate(var = prcp, scale = c(12, 24)) #> Removing the pending NAs due to aggregation #> Index pipeline:  #>  #> Summary:  #> temporal: `prcp` -> .agg #> temporal: `prcp` -> .agg #>  #> Data:  #> # A tibble: 704 × 8 #>    id                ym  prcp  tmax   tmin  tavg .scale  .agg #>    <chr>          <mth> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> #>  1 ASN00056032 1990 Dec   640  30.4 14.7   22.6      12  8382 #>  2 ASN00056032 1991 Jan  1108  27.5 15.9   21.7      12  8608 #>  3 ASN00056032 1991 Feb   628  28.0 15.5   21.8      12  7976 #>  4 ASN00056032 1991 Mar   204  26.2 11.8   19.0      12  7926 #>  5 ASN00056032 1991 Apr    44  24.2  6.57  15.4      12  6376 #>  6 ASN00056032 1991 May   630  21.3  7.52  14.4      12  5786 #>  7 ASN00056032 1991 Jun   242  19.6  3.65  11.6      12  5634 #>  8 ASN00056032 1991 Jul   580  15.3  0.519  7.91     12  5596 #>  9 ASN00056032 1991 Aug    14  17.8  1.67   9.76     12  5276 #> 10 ASN00056032 1991 Sep    78  21.1  3.07  12.1      12  5088 #> # title: Title — augment
text: data data id id date date var col gamma_adjust gamma_adjust

text: data data ... expression evaluate new_name new name

title: Title — normalise
code: normalise(   data,   dist,   gran = "month",   date,   id,   var,   n_boot = 1,   boot_seed = 123,   method = "lmoms",   gamma_adjust = TRUE )

title: Title — normalise
text: data data frame dist distributions gran granularity date date id id var var n_boot number bootstrap samples, default 1 boot_seed seed bootstrap sampling method fitting methods, one lmoms (L-moment), mle (Maximum Likelihood), mom (Method moment) gamma_adjust adjustment gamma, add reference

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

title: Rescaling functions — normal
code: normal()  weibull()  loglogistic()  rescale_zscore(var, na.rm = TRUE)  rescale_minmax(var, min = NULL, max = NULL, na.rm = TRUE)  rescale_center(var, na.rm = TRUE)

title: Rescaling functions — normal
text: var variable na.rm logical; whether remove NAs min min max max

title: Title — swap_exprs
text: obj indri object .var variable try alternative expression .exprs new expressions test .raw_data initial indri object created

title: Title — swap_values
text: obj obj .module module .step step .res res .var var .values values .raw_data original data

what: Precipitation in the Tenterfield station from 1990 to 2020 — tenterfield
title: Precipitation in the Tenterfield station from 1990 to 2020 — tenterfield
Precipitation in the Tenterfield station from 1990 to 2020 — tenterfield
Precipitation in the Tenterfield station from 1990 to 2020 — tenterfield
text: tibble three columns: id station ID, corresponds tenterfied station ym date yearmonth prcp summed monthly precipitation daily data

title: Title — theme_benchmark
code: if (require("ggplot2", quietly = TRUE) ){ dplyr::tibble(x = 1:100, y = rnorm(100, sd = 2)) %>%   ggplot(aes(x = x, y =y )) +   geom_line() +   theme_benchmark() }

title: Variable transformation — var_trans
text: data data ... expression .method method use .vars variables .new_name new name
